name: Palito Deluxe
description:
You have 20 minutes to complete the game.

Move with the arrow keys - ASDW - spacebar and controller

Hit M or both analog buttons on gameplay to reset to the menu and R or shoulder buttons for a quick level reset

ENTER or start for Pause and ESC to Quit the game

B or select/back button on gameplay to MUTE the music

EASY mode (10 minutes - Invincible) START WITH THIS ONE!

G changes fullscreen

There's a no time mode, an INFINITY mode  *wink* *wink*

Made for fun and to learn more about construct2

https://www.instagram.com/damianramirez4489/
